name: BLOOMING DELIRIUM
description:
Frien-Chipz is a recently created small independent studio made up of 4 game-loving friends who decided to do their own projects. The storytelling department formed by JemCy and Shapookie was encouraged to participate for the first time in a jam with this interactive novel that we hope you like.

 If you have any comments, we would love you to share them with us!.
